ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Not anymore as far as I know. You used to be able to but they removed the quest. 2) 3) Yes, killing wood elf slaves raises indigo brotherhood faction, but
ygData.messageBody:
1) Not anymore as far as I know. You used to be able to but they removed the
quest.

2)

3) Yes, killing wood elf slaves raises indigo brotherhood faction, but
killing high elf slaves raises The Dead faction. I personally spent 5 days
there, many hours a day, killing those elves until I could do the quests in
the house of the dead to raise my faction up. It took a long time but was
worth it in the end.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rich Hitz [mailto:Rich.Hitz@...]On Behalf Of (Cronikx)
> Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 11:55 AM
> To: '(Shadowknight)'
> Subject: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport
>
>
> From: "(Cronikx)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> Hello everyone. I am new here and have some questions for you.
> 1) Is it possible to not be KoS in Freeport propper as a Troll? By that I
> mean with the guards, merchants and other NPCs? I know the Arcane Science
> NPCs will always KoS you, but was not sure about the others.
>
> 2) Can you train as a Troll SK in Neriak at either the Troll SK in Foriegn
> 1/4, or at the DE SK guild? Cronikx's Diety is Innorukk.
>
> 3) Will killing slaves in Crushbone increase Dead faction in Neriak?
>
> --
> Cronikx
> 4th Sword of Hate
>
